Title: Relates to municipal cybersecurity incidents or ransomware attacks, and cybersecurity awareness training and data protection standards for state maintained information systems
Summary: Requires all municipal corporations to report cybersecurity incidents and demands of ransom payments to the division of homeland security and emergency services; defines terms; requires cybersecurity incident reviews; requires cybersecurity awareness training, cybersecurity protection and data protection standards for state maintained information systems.
LawCode: Add Art 19-C §§995-a - 995-c, Gen Muni L; add §711-c, Exec L; add §§103-f & 210, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the executive law, in relation to requiring municipal cybersecurity incident reporting and exempting such reports from freedom of information requirements; and to amend the state technology law, in relation to requiring cybersecurity awareness training for government employees, data protection standards, and cybersecurity protection
